title.value: The influence of microfertilizers on dynamics of accumulation of medicinal Valerian biomass
Влияние микроудобрений на динамику накопления биомассы валерианы лекарственной

journal.title: Soil Science and Agrochemistry : scientific journal

person.name: Milosta, G.M., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In course of the research there was studied the influence of micro fertilizers on dynamics of medicinal valerian (Valeriana officinalis) biomass accumulation. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus in Grodno region on sod-podzolic sandy-loam soil, laid by the exterminated loam, in 2011-2012. As a result of realized research it was revealed that application of micro fertilizers: boric, zinc, copper - on a background of organic and mineral fertilizers (60 t/ha of manure + N135P60K120) influenced on forming of biomass of medicinal valerian. Trace elements on the effectiveness of their impact on forming of biomass of roots and rhizomes of valerian both in soil and in foliar entering were possible to be disposed in the next order of decrease: Zn  B  Cu. Variants with the use of the foliar additional fertilizing by zinc (background + Zn(0.15+0.15+0.15)) and especially with joint application of zinc and boron (background + B(0.1+0.1+0.1) Zn(0.1+0.1+0.1)) had the most intensity of accumulation of general and underground biomass.
